property.name: description
property.value: The protagonist can watch six tapes from the VHS player. These tapes detail snippets of the Dreemurr family's lives, but they also detail [[Chara|the first human]]'s plan to break the [[Barrier]] with [[Asriel Dreemurr|Asriel]], as well as their subsequent death.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 主角可以從錄影帶播放器中觀看六捲錄影帶。這些錄影帶詳細記錄了 Dreemurr 家族生活的片段，也詳細記錄了[[Chara|第一個人類]]與 [[Asriel Dreemurr|Asriel]] 一起打破[[結界]]的計劃，以及第一個人類的死亡。

property.name: description
property.value: The protagonist activates the Power Room generator to restore power to the elevator. After doing so, a group of [[Amalgamates]] approach the protagonist, but [[Alphys]] stops them. She explains that she injected [[Determination]] extracted from the human [[SOUL]]s into fallen down monsters so that their SOULs would persist after death. However, since monsters' bodies cannot handle the amount of Determination Alphys was injecting, their bodies began to melt together. Alphys resolves to reveal the truth and bring the Amalgamates back to their families.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 主角啟動了動力室的發電機，恢復了電梯的電力。之後，一群[[合成怪物]]接近主角，但 [[Alphys]] 阻止它們。她表示她將從人類[[靈魂]]中提取的[[決心]]注入倒下的怪物體內，以便它們的靈魂在死後得以保留。然而由於怪物的身體無法承受 Alphys 注入的大量決心，它們的身體開始融化在一起。 Alphys 最後決定揭露真相，並將合成怪物帶回它們的家人身邊。

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 位於動力室門外面的存檔點。

property.name: zh_name
property.value: 真正的實驗室 - 臥室

property.name: description
property.value: The Red Key, dropped by [[Memoryhead]]. It is used to unlock the Power Room door.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 擊倒 [[Memoryhead]] 後掉落，可開啟動力室的門。

property.name: description
property.value: The Yellow Key, uncovered after inspecting the bed. It is used to unlock the Power Room door.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 在床的被子下，可開啟動力室的門。

property.name: description
property.value: The Green Key, uncovered by opening the shower curtain.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 在浴簾後面，可開啟動力室的門。

property.name: description
property.value: The Blue Key, dropped by [[Snowdrake's Mother]]. It is used to unlock the Power Room door.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 擊倒 [[Snowdrake's Mother]] 後掉落，可開啟動力室的門。

property.name: description
property.value: Battle against Memoryhead, triggered by turning on the sinks.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 與 Memoryhead 戰鬥，打開第三個水槽後。

property.name: description
property.value: Battle against Endogeny, triggered after turning on the fans.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 與 Endogeny 戰鬥，打開風扇後。

property.name: description
property.value: Battle against Reaper Bird, initially disguised as a random [[encounter]] indicator.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 與 Reaper Bird 戰鬥，通過鏡子後觸發[[遭遇戰|遭遇提示]]。

property.name: description
property.value: Battle against Lemon Bread, initially disguised as a [[SAVE Point]].

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 與 Lemon Bread 戰鬥，偽裝成[[存檔|存檔點]]。

property.name: description
property.value: Battle against Snowdrake's Mother, initially disguised as a refrigerator.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 與 Snowdrake's Mother 戰鬥，偽裝成冰箱。

properties.property: This is it... Time to do what the [[Asgore Dreemurr|King]] has asked me to do. I will create the power to free us all. I will unleash the power of the [[SOUL]].
時候到了...是時候去做[[Asgore Dreemurr|國王]]請託的事了。 我將創造一股解放我們所有怪物的力量。 我將釋放[[靈魂]]的力量。

The [[barrier]] is locked by [[SOUL]] power.. Unfortunately, this power cannot be recreated artificially. SOUL power can only be derived from what was once living. So, to create more, we will have to use what we have now... The SOULs of [[monsters]].
[[結界]]被[[靈魂]]的力量保護著.. 不幸的是，這股力量無法被人工重新創造出來。 靈魂之力只會來源於曾經存活的生物。 因此，為了創造更多，我們只能利用我們現有的東西... [[怪物]]的靈魂。

But extracting a [[SOUL]] from a living [[Monsters|monster]] would require incredible power... Besides being impractical, doing so would instantly destroy the SOUL's host. And, unlike the persistent SOULs of [[humans]]... The SOULs of most monsters disappear immediately upon death. If only I could make a monster's SOUL last...
但是想從一個仍活著的[[怪物]]中抽取出[[靈魂]]將會需要無法想像的力量... 除了不切實際以外，這樣做還會立即摧毀掉靈魂的主人。 而且，與[[人類]]的靈魂不同呃的是... 大多數怪物的靈魂都會在死亡時跟著消失。 要是我可以讓怪物的靈魂持續存在的話...

I've done it. Using the blueprints, I've extracted it from the human [[SOUL]]s. I believe this is what gives their SOULs the strength to persist after death. The will to keep living... The resolve to change fate. Let's call this power... "[[Determination]]."
搞定了。 藉由藍圖，我已經從人類的[[靈魂]]中把它提取出來了。 我認為就是這種力量讓人類的靈魂在死後仍能留存。 生存的意志...想要改變命運的恆心。 那就稱呼這種力量為 "[[決心]]"吧。

(There's a note on the ground... You can't make it all out.)
"elevator... lost power... enter the center door..."
(That's all you could read.)

(地上有張紙條... 你只能勉強看懂部分內容。)
"電梯...沒電...進入中間房間..."
(這些就是你能閱讀的內容。)

[[Asgore Dreemurr|ASGORE]] asked everyone outside the city for monsters that had "fallen down." Their bodies came in today. They're still comatose... And soon, they'll all turn into dust. But what happens if I inject "[[determination]]" into them? If their [[SOUL]]S persist after they perish, then... Freedom might be closer than we all thought.
[[Asgore Dreemurr|ASGORE]] 向城外的人要了那些"倒下"的怪物。 他們的身體今天送來了。他們還處在昏迷狀態呢... 不久後，他們將全部化為塵埃。但如果我給他們注入"[[決心]]"的話會發生什麼？ 如果他們死後，[[靈魂]]仍然存在的話，那麼... 自由可能比我們想像中的更近。

things aren't going well. none of the bodies have turned into dust, so i can't get the [[SOUL]]s. i told the families that i would give them the dust back for the funerals. people are starting to ask me what's happening. what do i do?
研究進展的不太順利。 沒有任何一具屍體化為塵埃，我也因此拿不到他們的[[靈魂]]。 我當初卻跟他們的家人說，會把他們的塵埃還給他們去舉辦葬禮。 大家都開始問我發生甚麼事了。 我該怎麼辦？

(There's a note on the ground... You can't make it all out.)
"drain... dropped it..."
(That's all you could read.)

(地上有張紙條... 你只能勉強看懂部分內容。)
"水槽...掉進去了..."
(這些就是你能閱讀的內容。)
nothing is happening. i don't know what to do. i'll just keep injecting everything with "[[determination]]." i want this to work.
什麼事都沒發生。 我不知道該做什麼。 我就繼續幫一切物體注入"[[決心]]"吧。 希望會有用。

property.name: description
property.value: ''one of the bodies opened its eyes.''

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 其中一具軀體張開眼睛了。

properties.property: Everyone that had fallen down... ... has woken up. They're all walking around and talking like nothing is wrong. I thought they were goners...?
每個已經倒下的怪物... 都活過來了。 他們四處閒晃，好像什麼事都沒發生過一樣。 他們不是都死透了嗎...？

Seems like this research was a dead end... But at least we got a happy ending out of it...? I sent the [[SOUL]]S back to [[Asgore Dreemurr|ASGORE]], returned the vessel to his garden... And I called all of the families and told them everyone's alive. I'll send everyone back tomorrow. :)
看來這個研究行不通了... 但至少結局還不錯吧...？ 我把[[靈魂]]和容器送回給 [[Asgore Dreemurr|ASGORE]]。 我還連絡了所有的家屬，說每個人都活過來了。 明天我會把每個人都送回家。: )

property.name: description
property.value: ''no No NO NO NO NO NO''

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 不 不 不 不 不 不

properties.property: now that [[mettaton]]'s made it big, he never talks to me anymore. ... except to ask when i'm going to finish [[Mettaton EX|his body]]. but i'm afraid if i finish his body, he won't need me anymore... then we'll never be friends ever again. ... not to mention, every time i try to work on it, i just get really sweaty...
[[Mettaton]] 現在功成名就了，就不再和我說話了。 ...除了問我什麼時候會完成[[Mettaton EX|他的身體]]。 但我害怕我一旦完成了他的身體，他就不再需要我了... 然後我們就不再是朋友了。 ...更何況，每次我嘗試做他的身體時，我都搞得滿身是汗...

We'll need a vessel to wield the monster [[SOUL]]s when the time comes. After all, a [[Monsters|monster]] cannot absorb the SOULs of other monsters. Just as a [[Humans|human]] cannot absorb a human SOUL... So then... What about something that's neither human nor monster?
我們需要一種容器，到時候才能裝下[[怪物]]的[[靈魂]]。 畢竟，怪物沒辦法吸收下其他怪物的靈魂， 就像一個[[人類]]也無法吸收其他人類的靈魂一樣。 既然如此... 那某種不是怪物也不是人類的東西呢？
experiments on the vessel are a failure. it doesn't seem to be any different from the control cases. whatever. they're a hassle to work with anyway. the seeds just stick to you, and won't let go...
要創造容器的實驗是個大失敗。 我的實驗成果與對照組根本沒有分別。 隨便啦，反正它們本來就很麻煩。 花朵的種子老是黏著你，根本弄不掉...

(There's a note on the ground... You can't make it all out.)
"cold..."
(That's all you could read.)

(地上有張紙條... 你只能勉強看懂部分內容。)
"冷..."
(這些就是你能閱讀的內容。)

(There's a note on the ground... You can't make it all out.)
"under... sheets..."
(That's all you could read.)

(地上有張紙條... 你只能勉強看懂部分內容。)
"被子...下面..."
(這些就是你能閱讀的內容。)

I've been researching [[humans]] to see if I can find any info about their [[SOUL]]S. I ended up snooping around the castle... And found these weird tapes. I don't feel like [[Asgore Dreemurr|ASGORE]]'s watched them... I don't think he should.
我一直在研究[[人類]]，看看能不能找到任何關於他們[[靈魂]]的資料。 最後，我偷偷潛入了城堡... 然後找到了這些奇怪的錄影帶。 我不覺得 [[Asgore Dreemurr|ASGORE]] 看過它們... 我也覺得他不應該看。
DT EXTRACTION MACHINE STATUS: INACTIVE
決心提取機 狀態：停機
the families keep calling me to ask when everyone is coming home. what am i supposed to say? i don't even answer the phone anymore.
家屬們一直打來問我什麼時候會讓大家都回去。 我該怎麼回答？ 我根本不想再接電話了。
[[Asgore Dreemurr|ASGORE]] left me five messages today. four about everyone being angry one about this cute teacup he found that looks like me thanks asgore.
[[Asgore Dreemurr|ASGORE]] 今天留下了五條訊息。 四條都在說大家有多憤怒。 最後一條是說他發現了一個長得像我的茶杯。 謝囉 asgore。
i spend all my time at the [[Garbage Dump|garbage dump]] now it's my element
我現在都待在[[瀑布#垃圾場|垃圾場]]了。 根本就變成我的一部分了。

(There's a note on the ground... You can't make it all out.)
"curtain..."
(That's all you could read.)

(地上有張紙條... 你只能勉強看懂部分內容。)
"浴簾..."
(這些就是你能閱讀的內容。)

I've chosen a candidate. I haven't told [[Asgore Dreemurr|ASGORE]] yet, because I want to surprise him with it... In the center of his garden, there's something special. The first [[Golden Flowers|golden flower]], that grew before all the others. The flower from the [[Surface|outside world]]. It appeared just before the [[Toriel|queen]] left. I wonder... What happens when something without a [[SOUL]] gains the will to live?
我已經挑好志願者了。 不過我還沒告訴 [[Asgore Dreemurr|ASGORE]]，因為我想給他一個驚喜... 就在他花園的正中心，有個特別的東西——第一朵[[金色花朵|金黃花]]， 那朵比其他花朵更早生長的花，從[[地表世界|地面]]上而來的花， 就在[[Toriel|皇后]]正要離開前出現的。 我在想...若 一個沒有[[靈魂]]的物體被給予生存的意志的話，會發生什麼事？

property.name: description
property.value: Appears after sleeping in the bed for long enough. It raises the bedsheets and tucks the protagonist in.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 在床上睡一段時間後它會出現。它會幫主角蓋棉被。

property.name: description
property.value: The protagonist can buy Popato Chisps from this vending machine for 25G.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 主角可以從這台自動販賣機以25G的價格購買[[薯片]]。

property.name: description
property.value: A locked door. The protagonist must locate four keys and insert them into their respective slots to unlock the door.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 一扇鎖著的門。主角必須找到四把鑰匙，並將它們分別插入對應的插槽才能打開。

property.name: description
property.value: The protagonist must locate the Red Key and insert it into its slot to unlock this door.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 主角必須找到紅鑰匙並將其插入插槽才能打開這扇門。

property.name: description
property.value: The protagonist must insert the Red Key into this slot to unlock the Power Room door and the door leading to the rest of the True Lab.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 主角必須將紅色鑰匙插入此插槽才能打開動力室的門和通往真正實驗室其餘部分的門。

property.name: description
property.value: Pressing this switch turns on the fans in the True Lab, clearing the fog from the rooms. The room with the refrigerators becomes traversible with the fog cleared.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 按下此開關即可開啟風扇，清除房間內的霧氣。霧氣消散後，冰箱房間即可通行。

property.name: description
property.value: The protagonist must insert the Blue Key into this slot to unlock the Power Room door.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 主角必須將藍色鑰匙插入此插槽才能打開動力室的門。

property.name: description
property.value: The protagonist must insert the Yellow Key into this slot to unlock the Power Room door.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 主角必須將黃色鑰匙插入此插槽才能打開動力室的門。

property.name: description
property.value: This room is initially fogged up, and nothing is visible. The protagonist must turn on the fans to clear the fog.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 這個房間最初被霧氣籠罩，導致什麼也看不見。主角必須打開風扇才能驅散霧氣。

property.name: description
property.value: The protagonist must insert the Green Key in this slot to unlock the Power Room door.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 主角必須將綠色鑰匙插入此插槽才能打開動力室的門。

property.name: description
property.value: The protagonist receives a phone call from an unknown voice, who refers to them by the name of [[Chara|the first human]]. After the phone call, the doors suddenly close, and the protagonist is thrust into [[New Home]].

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 主角接到一個陌生聲音打來的電話，對方將主角稱作[[Chara|第一個人類]]。電話打完後門突然關閉，主角被送到[[新居]]。
